title: Ten low priority queue games
body: On the Public Beta Environment (Aka-PBE) I had afk'd a few games and got leaverbuster. I accept my punishment and am willing to take it, but instead of getting the usual 5 games, I got 10 low priority queues (20 minutes). I looked it up, and I hadn't seen anybody else get these. Am I experiencing a bug or is this a PBE feature? All help is appreciated.

replies.body: I looked into your PBE account and was unable to find any lower priority queues; though, it's possible I'm not looking at the right one.  In general, your [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) can escalate based on constant game leaves and interruptions.  It is also the PBE, so it's possible that it's been placed in this way for testing purposes- and also low tolerance.  Leaving games can hinder testers, so it's crucial to stay in the match.
My summoner name is Aiyyy Lmaokai if that helps. On the PBE, of course

Yup, same deal.  Unfortunately, I wasn't able to see any LPQ's here.  If you're still seeing that you do have it, I would recommend reporting it to the [PBE community](http://pbr.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en_BE/login).  Unfortunately, there wouldn't be anything I could provide from here.  I hope that helps!
